Conversion from quarterly to annual frequency

Source: R/fcst_utils.R
QtoA.Rd

Conversion from quarterly to annual frequency

Usage

QtoA(ser_in, aggr = "mean")

Arguments

ser_in

the xts series to be converted (freq = q)

aggr

aggregate via mean (default) or sum

Value

converted xts series (freq = a)

Examples

`ncen@us.sola` <- ts(NA_real_, start = 2016, end = 2021, freq = 1) |> tsbox::ts_xts()
`ncen@us.sola`["2016/2021"] <- c(323127513, 325511184, 327891911, 330268840, 332639102, 334998398)
test1 <- AtoQ(`ncen@us.sola`)
#> Joining with `by = join_by(time)`
test2 <- QtoA(test1) # for stock type variables mean, for flow type variables sum
print(test1)
#>                value
#> 2016-01-01 322233636
#> 2016-04-01 322829554
#> 2016-07-01 323425472
#> 2016-10-01 324021390
#> 2017-01-01 324618411
#> 2017-04-01 325213593
#> 2017-07-01 325808775
#> 2017-10-01 326403957
#> 2018-01-01 327000563
#> 2018-04-01 327594795
#> 2018-07-01 328189027
#> 2018-10-01 328783259
#> 2019-01-01 329379992
#> 2019-04-01 329972557
#> 2019-07-01 330565123
#> 2019-10-01 331157688
#> 2020-01-01 331754366
#> 2020-04-01 332344190
#> 2020-07-01 332934014
#> 2020-10-01 333523838
#> 2021-01-01 334113662
#> 2021-04-01 334703486
#> 2021-07-01 335293310
#> 2021-10-01 335883134
print(cbind(`ncen@us.sola`, test2))
#>                value   value.1
#> 2016-01-01 323127513 323127513
#> 2017-01-01 325511184 325511184
#> 2018-01-01 327891911 327891911
#> 2019-01-01 330268840 330268840
#> 2020-01-01 332639102 332639102
#> 2021-01-01 334998398 334998398
